title: Louis Garneau, Fit Sensor 3 Shorts
features: Comfort waistband without pressure at front
Reflective Logos at front and back
description: The new Fit Sensor 3 short, our company best seller short ever is updated with a new fresh look. The Fit Sensor short is the best choice for any cyclist becoming a bit more serious on the saddle without wanting to pay for the high end styles, Yet! Made of a double constrution with a polyester back that enhances moisture and an outside nylon that is super resistant, the fit sensor short is very comfortable, fits great and will make you feel good especially if you are not sure of the lycra look. Made with our patented Airzone chamois, a 4-way stretch chamois withperforated vents to keep you dry, the Fit Sensor short will be the perfect pick for those "few-hour" rides!
